**Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual Secret Key**

**Title:** *Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual Secret Key*
**Author:** Unknown
**Volume:** One scroll
**Source:** *Zhengtong Daozang* (Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity), *Tongxuan* (Cavernous Mysteries) section, *Zhongshu* (Miscellaneous Arts) category.

---

**Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual**

**Heaven’s Gate Entry Incantation**
*Heaven’s Gate opens wide,*
*Six Jia* (六甲) *support me,*
*Golden lock, jade key—*
*Swiftly comply, do not delay.*
*Sweep away all impurities,*
*Malevolent spirits, beware!*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Earth’s Gate Exit Incantation**
*Four Passes open wide,*
*Do not let stagnation block me.*
*The Jade Maiden guides me,*
*Do not let [certain spirit] obstruct,*
*Today is auspicious,*
*Misfortune vanishes, blessings abound,*
*I move freely, unhampered.*
*Having left Earth’s Gate,*
*No more worries or hindrances.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Six Compliance Rituals** (六仪击刑)
*All matters proceed as desired,*
*Six Compliance Rituals strike the penalty.*
*I wish to advance,*
*The Celestial Puff* (天蓬) *descends with spirit.*
*The White Sovereign leads the way,*
*The Red Sovereign guards my body.*
*Dare any oppose me,*
*My flesh shall turn to dust and bones.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Three Marvels Enter the Tomb** (三奇入墓)
*Heaven possesses three marvels,*
*Yet fears [certain] deity.*
*Descending upon direct affairs,*
*It harms the spirits Bu, Ding, Bing* (乙丙丁).
*I summon Heaven’s Army,*
*Hold the talisman, ensure peace.*
*Urgent, as the Supreme Unity’s Command to Open the Heavenly Net.*

**Supreme Brightness Enters the Fire** (太白入火)
*Above the Nine Heavens,*
*Supreme Brightness* (太白) *holds its yin essence.*
*Its movement aligns with the Fire Star* (火星).
*Beneficial for battle,*
*And for sacrificial rites.*
*I invoke Heaven’s Might,*
*Reveal the future penalty.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Fire Enters the Metal Realm** (火入金乡)
*The Fire Star* (荧惑) *and Fire Essence*
*Descend into my Metal Realm.*
*Supreme Brightness* (太白) *shatters them,*
*Encountering Fire brings peace.*
*Should any harm me,*
*The Supreme Unity descends with spirit.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Second Dragon: Wenzheng** (乙龙文卿)
*The White Tiger clears the path,*
*The Azure Dragon guides me.*
*All actions must be cautious,*
*Blessings and virtue swiftly aid.*
*Heaven’s Imperial Might*
*Commands the annihilation of ghosts and bandits.*
*The Six Seconds* (六乙) *support each other,*
*The Dao praises my virtue.*
*My current journey—*
*Attack without defeat.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Third Dragon: Zhongqing** (丙唐仲卿)
*The Heavenly Marshal* (天罡) *exalts its mighty power,*
*Always accompanied by the Azure Dragon and White Tiger* (白呼).
*It executes Heaven’s Bandits and Captives,*
*Dare any disobey, they shall face the Heavenly Axe* (仗天斧).
*I have Heaven’s favor,*
*Before and behind, the net conceals me.*
*The Azure Dragon and White Tiger*
*Drive away demons on either side.*
*The Vermilion Bird* (朱雀) *leads my procession,*
*So none may hinder me.*
*Heaven’s Might protects me,*
*The Six Thirds* (六丙) *ward off all afflictions.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Fourth Dragon: Jizheng** (丁季文卿)
*The Six Fourths* (六丁) *and the Jade Maiden* (玉女) *are named Divine Mother,*
*Summoned, they breathe and come to shield me.*
*Cool, clear waters teem with holy herbs,*
*Plucked, they shall not obstruct me.*
*Addressing the Heavenly Emperor’s disciples,*
*The Grand Marshal* (都统) *of Heaven’s Army,*
*Rewarding the good, punishing the evil,*
*Emerging from the dark, entering the netherworld.*
*Those who come to protect me,*
*The Jade Maiden and Six Fourths.*
*Those who harm me,*
*Shall perish in form.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Day Marvel Seal** (日奇印)
**Moon Marvel Seal** (月奇印)
**Star Marvel Seal** (星奇印)
*Carved from lightning-struck* (雷霹) *feng wood* (枫木) *and jujube wood* (枣木),*
*Polished with true sand.*
*Worn inside as an amulet.*

*Invoking the Celestial Grandson [spirit],*
*Today I must go to [certain place],*
*For [certain matter].*
*The matter is urgent,*
*Disaster looms,*
*No time to delay.*
*I solemnly gather the Nine Heavens’* (九天) *Mystic Woman* (玄女), *Feng Huo* (风后),
*The Six Jia Generals* (六甲将军),
*The Six Fourths and Jade Maiden* (六丁玉女),
*The Twelve Lunar Marshals* (十二月将),
*And all Ten Thousand Spirits.*
*Drawing the array on the ground,*
*I proceed directly to [certain place].*
*Every step and halt as desired,*
*All monsters vanish.*
*From the Day Branch* (子日) *of the current Earthly Branch,*
*Begin the incantation for the Day Branch Seal:*

*Heaven’s Gate, Heaven’s Gate,*
*Swiftly open for me!*
*I wish to do [certain matter],*
*To advance into the Hall of Sovereigns.*
*Swiftly draw the Golden Lock,*
*Quickly retrieve the Jade Key to save my body,*
*Assist me without pause.*

*Earth’s Gate Exit Incantation*
*Four Passes open wide,*
*Do not let stagnation block me.*
*The Jade Maiden guides me,*
*Do not let [certain spirit] obstruct,*
*Today is auspicious,*
*Misfortune vanishes, blessings abound,*
*I move freely, unhampered.*
*Having left Earth’s Gate,*
*No more worries or hindrances.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

*Heaven’s Gate Entry Incantation*
*Heaven’s Gate opens wide,*
*Six Jia* (六甲) *support me,*
*Golden lock, jade key—*
*Swiftly comply, do not delay.*
*Sweep away all impurities,*
*Malevolent spirits, beware.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

*The Jade Maiden Riding Incantation*
*Heaven’s Gate, Heaven’s Gate,*
*Today is auspicious and good.*
*The Jade Maiden, the Jade Maiden,*
*Attend and guard beside me.*
*Departing in the Four Directions,*
*No calamity shall meet me.*
*The noble shall see me,*
*Joy and delight without end.*
*All requests fulfilled,*
*Ten thousand matters prosper.*
*Urgent, as the Supreme Unity’s Command.*

*According to the Day Branch* (子日) *example, follow this pattern.*

**Supreme Unity’s High Purity Eight Scenes Returning Chariot Complete Dao/Way of Flying Spirit Secret Method** (太上上清八景回车毕道飞灵秘法)
*On the very day of the Great Heat* (大暑),
*When the Earth Branch* (土旺) *is potent,*
*One may conceal their form, hide their traces,*
*So none shall see them,*
*And transform into another shape.*
*The Six Wu* (六戊) *follow the talisman,*
*Close the array with Wu Chen* (戊辰).
*The incantation—*
*The Heavenly Spirits aid the High Purity Dao/Way,*
*Seal its name.*
*One person may perform it,*
*And all Nine Heavens and Ten Thousand Earths shall obey.*

**Great Heat Six Wu Concealment Talisman** (大暑六戊隐形符)
*The Left True Person* (左真人) *says:*
*This Six Wu Method,*
*When deploying the array and acting,*
*Is equal in power to Heaven’s Gate and Earth’s Gate,*
*The Phoenix Star* (蓬星), *Supreme Yang* (太阳), *Supreme Yin* (太阴),
*Marching the Hexagrams* (步罡), *Treading the Stars* (蹑斗),
*According to the Ten Heavenly Stems* (十干) *of day and time,*
*Enter first, invoking the spirit below the heart,*
*To fulfill the plans of the ritual.*
*Identify the directions of Heaven’s Gate and Earth’s Gate,*
*Know where the Jade Maiden stands guard.*
*Then, with the left hand holding a blade,*
*At the Ghost Gate* (鬼门) *take soil to build the walls,*
*Next, take the Six Wu talisman,*
*In the four straight directions of the Six Wu array,*
*Mark them with soil,*
*Press the Six Wu Seal between them,*
*And from the central soil rise,*
*So none shall see you,*
*Much less the common folk.*

**Six Wu Divine Talisman** (六戊神符)
*This talisman governs the Six Passes,*
*Press the Six Wu,*
*On yellow silk or yellow paper,*
*With female yellow ochre* (雌黄) *write the Branch and Stem* (支干) *of Wu,*
*And Vermilion write the seals.*

First, on the **Wu-Chen** day, make the offering, and continue through to **Wu-Wu**, thus communicating with spirits.

Always use yellow paper to write the talisman, and offer it with wine.

If there is an ancient city, determine its cardinal directions by the prefectural and county offices, marking the **Six Wu** positions.

Within the prefectural and county offices, take soil from the empty ground above the **monthly taboo** area—one *dou* and two *sheng*—and with wealth paper and wine, make offerings to the Six Gods.

Alternatively, open the **orifice** and bury the talisman, covering it with soil, and burn paper money above it.

If the land is unclean or impure, divide the soil, burn it, and place the talisman and paper upon it, beginning on **Jia-Zi** of the **Wu-Chen** decan.

The rest follows similarly.

If there is no seal, write the talisman below the day’s name in ink, and inscribe the deity’s name.

**Right:** This **Six Wu Seal**, on **Six Wu** days, according to the day’s Branch, carve it on a thriving patch of land, without vermilion, in a square diagram of **2.8 cun**.

On **Six Jia** days, fell a **sandalwood** tree to carve it, and chant:

*"Today’s use, felling wood to carve the seal,
The Heavenly Seal is delivered to the **Effigy**,
Seizing the **killer star**, exhausting all evil spirits.
Heaven, Earth, Sun, and Moon—
Their power spreads beneath the heavens like an image,
Hiding my traces, concealing my form.
As the **Heavenly Capital’s Jade Well Decree** commands."*

For **Six Wu** encampments, draw with a blade, beginning from the **Wu** of the current decan and moving leftward, encircling the perimeter in one continuous stroke to mark the boundaries. At the center, perform the **Yu Step**, and chant:

*"On the sunny slope of **Tai Mountain**,
In the shadow of **Heng Mountain**,
Thieves and bandits shall not rise,
Tigers and wolves shall not intrude.
The Heavenly Emperor obeys me,
Hiding my form in concealment,
The city walls stand firm as iron,
Like the **Golden Pass** unbreached.
Ten thousand calamities, a hundred evils—
None dare approach.
Swiftly, as the **Decree** commands."*

*«Once the incantation is complete, face the **straight decan Wu** direction on the ground, take one *dou* of soil, and evenly divide it into six piles. Arrange these piles in the **Wu** of the six decans, then recite the incantation and swiftly cut a talisman beneath each pile with a blade. Bury the soil and seal the hole—one *dou* and two *sheng* of earth, evenly measured, without speaking.

If one wishes to test it, take a heifer and place its calf outside the gate. The beast will never dare enter.

Now, solemnly invoke the **Eastern** gods: **Gongcao**, **Tai Chong**, and the **Heavenly Gang** Great Deity; **Qing Di**, the **Jia-Yi** generals. Invoke the **Southern** gods: **Tai Yi**, **Sheng Guang**, **Xiao Ji**, and **Chi Di**, the **Bing-Ding** Fire Deities. Invoke the **Western** gods: **Chuan Song**, **Cong Kui**, **He Kui**, and **Bai Di**, the **Geng-Xin** generals. Invoke the **Northern** gods: **Deng Ming**, **Shen Hou**, **Da Ji**, and **Hei Di**, the **Ren-Gui** generals, to descend and guard this site, protecting my person.

After invoking the four directions’ gods, begin from today’s **decan hour** and proceed with the **divinatory tally method**—in the sequence **Zi-Xu**, **Chou-Hai**, **Yin-Wei**, **Shen-Hai**, **Wu-Chen**, **Yin-Yu**—employing the **six-tally method** until completion.

First, establish the **Heavenly Gate (Tian Men)**, then the **Earthly Portal (Di Hu)**. If the four **central decans (Si Zhong)** fail to form the Earthly Portal, take the first tally of the **lower decan (Xia Shou)** and place it on the **upper decan (Gan Ke)**—the formation will naturally succeed.

Having completed the tally method with a shout, next traverse the **Northern Dipper (Bei Dou)**, subjugating all evils. The original scripture further states: The **God of the Northern Tian Yi**—if a person encounters malevolence with a sincere heart and faith, performs the **Yu Step**, and recites this ritual, then a hundred evils shall not dare harm.

After completing the **Yu Step**, enter the center of the formation. Draw the sword through empty space and inscribe the **Great Concealment (Da Yin)** and **Lesser Concealment (Xiao Yin)** talismans. If the words are forgotten, carve two talismans on yellow paper with vermilion seals and burn them toward the sky.

**Restriction Gate (Xiu Men)**—**Kan** Water, Earthly Escape (Di Dun).
**Opening Gate (Kai Men)**—**Qian** Gold, Heavenly Escape (Tian Dun).
**Life Gate (Sheng Men)**—**Gen** Soil, Thunder Escape (Lei Dun).
**Official Gate (Guan Men)**—**Zhen** Wood, Official Escape (Guan Dun).
**Stopping Gate (Du Men)**—**Xun** Wood, Subjugation Escape (Fu Dun).
**Joy Gate (Jing Men)**—**Li** Fire, Rectification Escape (Zheng Dun).
**Death Gate (Si Men)**—**Kun** Soil, Reflection Escape (Jing Dun).
**Risk Gate (Jing Men)**—**Dui** Gold, Hazard Escape (Xian Dun).

The original scripture states: Within a **six-foot courtyard** or **six-step wild formation**, or even **sixty steps**, these are the measures. Then, with the left hand holding the **six tallies**, each one a foot and two *cun* long, and the right hand holding the blade, inhale the **vigorous qi**, strike the teeth twelve times, and pray from the heart below, “For the sake of [certain matter].”

Then, return and face the **vigorous decan gods**, the four **vigorous decans**—**Spring Mao**, **Summer Wu**, **Autumn You**, **Winter Zi**—and solemnly invoke: “In the year [X], month [X], day [X], hour [X], I respectfully inform **Heavenly Father** and **Earthly Mother**, the **Six Jia** and **Six Decans**, the **Twelve Earthly Branches**, the **Qing Long** and **Peng Star**, the **Ming Tang** and **Tai Yin**, the **Heavenly Gate** and **Earthly Portal**, the **Jade Maiden** and **Hua Gai**, to conceal my body and hide my form. I depart without regard for auspicious days, and return without regard for auspicious times.

Now, to travel for [certain matter], relying on the Great Deities. I solemnly consult the **celestial omens**, invoke the **Jade Maiden**, draw the earthly measures, exit through the **Heavenly Gate**, enter the **Earthly Portal**, close the **Golden Pass**, and ride upon the **Jade Maiden**.

I invoke the **Jade Maiden**, **Qing Long**, **Bai Hu**, **Zhu Que**, **Xuan Wu**, **Gou Chen**, and **Sheng She**—the **Six Harmonious Talismans**—and recite the incantation:

“Six Jia, Six Gods, Twelve Earthly Branches,
Riding with me to reach [certain place].
Guard on my left and right,
Cease when I stop, rise when I act.
Ward off thieves and bandits,
Dispel ghosts and spirits.
The virtuous see me and rejoice beyond measure;
The petty see me and tremble in fear.”»

Now, when men and women see me, they shall set forth wine and offerings.
Those who plot against me shall die, those who oppose me shall perish.

Today, I perform the **Yǔbù** [步], ascending to the **Heavenly Ganges** [罡].
The **Jade Maiden** attends at my side,
while below, I repel all inauspiciousness.
Ten thousand spirits submit in dread,
and all evils are crushed beneath my tread.

Where I heal, peace is restored;
where I attack, victory is won;
where I strike, defeat is assured;
where I seek, fulfillment is granted;
where I wish, success is achieved.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

Noble **Chángwáng** [常王], great officials, and magistrates who see me
shall love me as their own child,
and all the people shall honor me as their parents.

Today, I solemnly invoke the **Jade Maiden** and her Great Deity,
who shall guide me forward,
and those who summon me shall be restored to their ranks,
while the **Precious Banner** [宝旗] is dismissed.

Having summoned and petitioned the spirits, I proceed with the **Yǔbù** method.
Three steps, nine tracks,
a **Dingzi** [丁字] step of nine paces,
each pace seven *chǐ* [尺], three times seven—twenty-one *chǐ*.

With my right hand, I hold the **Six Calculus Talismans** [六算子],
grasp a sword from the **Gèn Soil** [艮土],
trace the earth in sequence,
and when complete, reverse and sheath the sword in **Gèn Soil** to command the ghosts and spirits—
all malevolence shall be subdued.

Having entered the formation, next I tread the **Big Dipper** [北斗],
summoning the **Nine Stars** [九星] and their **Gāng Steps** [步罡].
With each step, I recite aloud:

*"The Dipper’s splendor is wondrous,
Riding the twelve *shíchén* [时辰] upon its luminous light.
Its awe and might are manifest,
Like floating clouds shifting seven times—
ascending to the Heavenly Hosts who know all transformations,
entering the Dipper’s lodges with fortune or calamity.

Passing the Heavenly Gate, harmonizing the Six *Lǜ* [律],
commanding arms and treading the Heavenly Ganges [天英].
Crossing the Heavenly Task [天任] into the Clear and Cold Abyss [清泠渊],
one may sink or stand firm upon the Heavenly Pillar [天柱].

Embracing the Heavenly Heart [天心] from this crossing,
stepping upon the Heavenly Game [天禽] and leaning on the Heavenly Auxiliary [天辅].
Gazing toward the Heavenly Surge [天冲] into the Heavenly Interior [天内],
exiting through the Heavenly Cover [天蓬]—the Dipper’s path is clear.

The Heavenly Gentle [天柔] dispels ten thousand evils,
and all ghosts, abandoned, bring forth blessings and longevity.
Preserved for future generations, entering the dim and boundless [杳冥],
for ten thousand years.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

On **Yang days** [阳日] of the **Six Heavenly Stems** [甲丙戊庚壬]:
First, establish the **Heavenly Ganges** [天英] and **Heavenly Interior** [天内].
Left foot, eight paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱],
left foot, three paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱]—
**Heavenly Heart** [天心], both feet rotating, left foot steps four.

**Heavenly Ganges** [天英], left foot rises one pace;
**Heavenly Game** [天禽], left foot, five paces.

**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬], right foot steps—**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬] emerges.
**Heavenly Auxiliary** [天辅], left foot, six paces (left foot lifted).
**Heavenly Surge** [天冲], left foot, seven paces.
**Heavenly Task** [天任], left foot, two paces.

On **Yin days** [阴日] of the **Six Heavenly Stems** [乙丁己辛癸]:
First, establish **Heavenly Cover** [天蓬] and **Heavenly Interior** [天内].
Right foot, two paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱],
left foot, seven paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱]—
**Heavenly Heart** [天心], right foot, six paces.

**Heavenly Ganges** [天英], left foot, nine paces;
**Heavenly Game** [天禽], left foot, five paces.
**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬], left foot, one pace.
**Heavenly Auxiliary** [天辅], left foot, four paces.
**Heavenly Surge** [天冲], left foot, three paces;
**Heavenly Task** [天任], right foot, eight paces.

The incantation reads:

*"Six *Lǜ* [律] and Nine *Cháng* [章],
Heaven’s round and Earth’s square,
Four seasons and Five *Xíng* [行],
Sun and Moon as radiance.

The **Yǔbù** [禹步] governs the Dao,
**Chīyóu** [蚩尤] repels the armies.
**Qīnglóng** [青龙] seizes the axle,
**Bái Hǔ** [白虎] supports the decline.
**Yínghuò** [荧惑] leads the way,
repelling all inauspiciousness,
while the **Big Dipper** [北斗] slays evil,
and extinguishes all calamitous omens.

The Five Spirits [五神] guard and attend me,
circling the four quarters.
**Dù** [杜] on my left, **Jì** [稷] on my right,
bind them as my bells and chains.

Thousand mouths, ten thousand tongues,
malevolent men and malevolent ghosts,
tigers, wolves, thieves, and bandits—
all sealed and subdued in filth.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

Having finished the incantation,
I turn left and enter the **Earthly Portal** [地户],
exit through the **Heavenly Gate** [天门],
and depart in the direction of the **Jade Maiden**.

The incantation reads:

*"Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,
protect me, preserve me.
Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,
guard me, attend me—
let no hundred ghosts harm me.
Traveling to [certain place],
neither man nor ghost shall recognize me.

Mysterious and shadowy,
no one sees my form.
Men who see me take me for a bundle of firewood,
and hear no sound from me.
Ghosts see no trace of my **qi** [精].

Those who favor me shall prosper,
those who harm me shall suffer.
A hundred malevolent ghosts and bandits—
those who face me shall die,
those who encounter me shall perish.

Among a thousand people, ten thousand,
those who see me shall rejoice.
I open my own gate alone,
and block the Earthly Portal [地户].
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands."*

Close the door and shut your eyes,
then take your dagger in hand and draw—
three leftward revolutions—before departing.
**Never look back** as you go straight ahead.

The Jade Maiden’s closure follows.

**Days for entry:**
Child, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake,
Horse, Sheep, Monkey, Rooster, Dog, Pig.

The **Yellow Emperor’s** *Great Unity* **Eight Gates** entry formula—
**Secret Key** complete.

chunks.original_text: 黄帝太一八门入式秘诀 经名：黄帝太一八门入式秘诀。 撰人不详。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部众术类。 黄帝太一八门入式秘诀 入天门咒 天门开泰，六甲扶持，金锁玉钥，速□莫违。 扫荡邪秽，恶鬼怯之。 急急如律令。 出地户咒 四道开泰，无令屯塞。 玉女度我，勿令某甲，今日大吉，祸消福洽，自然步驿。 我去地户，更无忧窒。 急急如律令。 六仪击刑 百事成式，六仪击刑。 吾欲前去，天蓬降灵。 白帝前引，赤帝卫身。 敢有当我，身粉骨尘。 急急如律令。 三奇入墓 天有三奇，惟忧某神，加临直事，害乙丙丁。 吾奉天兵，守符安宁。 急急如开天云罗上帝律令。 返克损明 日月无精，运我灭明。 五辰不遇，太白精明。 吾加此圣，六利九征。 急急如律令。 太白入火 九天之上，太白阴精。 运式同转，来临火星。 利於战斗，宜於郊垌。 惟奉天威。 示未来刑。 急急如律令。 火入金乡 荧惑火精，来入吾金。 太白坚破，逢火安宁。 彼欲害我，上帝降灵。 急急如律令。 乙龙文卿 白虎除道路，青龙导引吾。 所作慎勿悮，福德速来助。 天帝威神，教灭鬼贼。 六乙相扶，天道赞德。 吾今所行，攻无不克。 急急如律令。 丙唐仲卿 天罡大圣扬威武，常有青龙与白呼。 行诛天贼及天虏，敢有不从仗天斧。 吾身得天，前后遮罗。 青龙白虎，左右祛魔。 朱雀导从，使吾无他。 天威护我，六丙烦痾。 急急如律令。 丁季文卿 六丁玉女名神母，呼而吸之来我护。 清泠之水多神草，折之自障勿惊骇。 咄天帝弟子，都统天兵，赏善罚恶，出幽入冥。 来护我者，玉女六丁。 有害我者，自灭其形。 急急如律令。 日奇印。 月奇印。 星奇印。 右用雷霹枫木、枣木雕之、用真砂尝拭，在内佩带。 叩神曾孙某，今欲往某处，为某事，事在窘促，祸在顷刻，不容少驻。 谨集九天玄女、风后，六甲将军，六丁玉女，十二月将，万神声集，画地成局，径往某处，动辍如意，百怪消亡。 从当日地支入局咒子日子上起 天门天门，急来开之，我欲为某事，要往殿廷。 速为抽取金关为我速收金钥救我形身，辅我勿停。 出地户咒 四道开泰，无令屯塞。 玉女度我，勿令某甲，今日大吉，祸消福洽，自然步驿。 我去地户，更无忧窒。 急急如律令。 入天门咒： 天门泰开，六甲扶持。 金锁玉钥，速□莫违。 扫荡邪秽，恶鬼松之。 急急如律令。 乘玉女咒： 天门天门，今日吉良。 玉女玉女，侍卫我傍。 去行四出，不逢祸殃。 君子见我，喜乐无央。 所求如意，万事吉昌。 急急如太上帝君律令。 子日例余仿此 太上上清八景回车毕道飞灵秘法曰：大暑之正行土旺，能潜形隐迹人不见，变化作别形。 六戊随符印，闭局用戊辰。 咒法，天神助太清秘其名，一人能作，万天地皆归从。 大暑六戊隐形符 左真人曰：此六戊法者，布局行事，等视天门地户，蓬星太阳太阴，步罡蹑斗，依十干之日时，入先祝心下所谋之事，行算之从长。 认天门地户之方，明玉女守门之处。 然后，左手提刀，於鬼门取土作城壁，次取六戊之符，四直六戊之方，以土副之，按六戊印其间代之，起潜於中央之地，至神明无见也，何况众人乎。 六戊神符 右此符六道，按六戊，以黄绢，或黄纸，以雌黄书支干戊支，斗朱书篆。
chunks.translated_text:
**Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual Secret Key**

**Title:** *Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual Secret Key*
**Author:** Unknown
**Volume:** One scroll
**Source:** *Zhengtong Daozang* (Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity), *Tongxuan* (Cavernous Mysteries) section, *Zhongshu* (Miscellaneous Arts) category.

---

**Yellow Emperor’s Supreme Unity Eight Gates Entry Ritual**

**Heaven’s Gate Entry Incantation**
*Heaven’s Gate opens wide,*
*Six Jia* (六甲) *support me,*
*Golden lock, jade key—*
*Swiftly comply, do not delay.*
*Sweep away all impurities,*
*Malevolent spirits, beware!*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Earth’s Gate Exit Incantation**
*Four Passes open wide,*
*Do not let stagnation block me.*
*The Jade Maiden guides me,*
*Do not let [certain spirit] obstruct,*
*Today is auspicious,*
*Misfortune vanishes, blessings abound,*
*I move freely, unhampered.*
*Having left Earth’s Gate,*
*No more worries or hindrances.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Six Compliance Rituals** (六仪击刑)
*All matters proceed as desired,*
*Six Compliance Rituals strike the penalty.*
*I wish to advance,*
*The Celestial Puff* (天蓬) *descends with spirit.*
*The White Sovereign leads the way,*
*The Red Sovereign guards my body.*
*Dare any oppose me,*
*My flesh shall turn to dust and bones.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Three Marvels Enter the Tomb** (三奇入墓)
*Heaven possesses three marvels,*
*Yet fears [certain] deity.*
*Descending upon direct affairs,*
*It harms the spirits Bu, Ding, Bing* (乙丙丁).
*I summon Heaven’s Army,*
*Hold the talisman, ensure peace.*
*Urgent, as the Supreme Unity’s Command to Open the Heavenly Net.*

**Supreme Brightness Enters the Fire** (太白入火)
*Above the Nine Heavens,*
*Supreme Brightness* (太白) *holds its yin essence.*
*Its movement aligns with the Fire Star* (火星).
*Beneficial for battle,*
*And for sacrificial rites.*
*I invoke Heaven’s Might,*
*Reveal the future penalty.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Fire Enters the Metal Realm** (火入金乡)
*The Fire Star* (荧惑) *and Fire Essence*
*Descend into my Metal Realm.*
*Supreme Brightness* (太白) *shatters them,*
*Encountering Fire brings peace.*
*Should any harm me,*
*The Supreme Unity descends with spirit.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Second Dragon: Wenzheng** (乙龙文卿)
*The White Tiger clears the path,*
*The Azure Dragon guides me.*
*All actions must be cautious,*
*Blessings and virtue swiftly aid.*
*Heaven’s Imperial Might*
*Commands the annihilation of ghosts and bandits.*
*The Six Seconds* (六乙) *support each other,*
*The Dao praises my virtue.*
*My current journey—*
*Attack without defeat.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Third Dragon: Zhongqing** (丙唐仲卿)
*The Heavenly Marshal* (天罡) *exalts its mighty power,*
*Always accompanied by the Azure Dragon and White Tiger* (白呼).
*It executes Heaven’s Bandits and Captives,*
*Dare any disobey, they shall face the Heavenly Axe* (仗天斧).
*I have Heaven’s favor,*
*Before and behind, the net conceals me.*
*The Azure Dragon and White Tiger*
*Drive away demons on either side.*
*The Vermilion Bird* (朱雀) *leads my procession,*
*So none may hinder me.*
*Heaven’s Might protects me,*
*The Six Thirds* (六丙) *ward off all afflictions.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**The Fourth Dragon: Jizheng** (丁季文卿)
*The Six Fourths* (六丁) *and the Jade Maiden* (玉女) *are named Divine Mother,*
*Summoned, they breathe and come to shield me.*
*Cool, clear waters teem with holy herbs,*
*Plucked, they shall not obstruct me.*
*Addressing the Heavenly Emperor’s disciples,*
*The Grand Marshal* (都统) *of Heaven’s Army,*
*Rewarding the good, punishing the evil,*
*Emerging from the dark, entering the netherworld.*
*Those who come to protect me,*
*The Jade Maiden and Six Fourths.*
*Those who harm me,*
*Shall perish in form.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

**Day Marvel Seal** (日奇印)
**Moon Marvel Seal** (月奇印)
**Star Marvel Seal** (星奇印)
*Carved from lightning-struck* (雷霹) *feng wood* (枫木) *and jujube wood* (枣木),*
*Polished with true sand.*
*Worn inside as an amulet.*

*Invoking the Celestial Grandson [spirit],*
*Today I must go to [certain place],*
*For [certain matter].*
*The matter is urgent,*
*Disaster looms,*
*No time to delay.*
*I solemnly gather the Nine Heavens’* (九天) *Mystic Woman* (玄女), *Feng Huo* (风后),
*The Six Jia Generals* (六甲将军),
*The Six Fourths and Jade Maiden* (六丁玉女),
*The Twelve Lunar Marshals* (十二月将),
*And all Ten Thousand Spirits.*
*Drawing the array on the ground,*
*I proceed directly to [certain place].*
*Every step and halt as desired,*
*All monsters vanish.*
*From the Day Branch* (子日) *of the current Earthly Branch,*
*Begin the incantation for the Day Branch Seal:*

*Heaven’s Gate, Heaven’s Gate,*
*Swiftly open for me!*
*I wish to do [certain matter],*
*To advance into the Hall of Sovereigns.*
*Swiftly draw the Golden Lock,*
*Quickly retrieve the Jade Key to save my body,*
*Assist me without pause.*

*Earth’s Gate Exit Incantation*
*Four Passes open wide,*
*Do not let stagnation block me.*
*The Jade Maiden guides me,*
*Do not let [certain spirit] obstruct,*
*Today is auspicious,*
*Misfortune vanishes, blessings abound,*
*I move freely, unhampered.*
*Having left Earth’s Gate,*
*No more worries or hindrances.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

*Heaven’s Gate Entry Incantation*
*Heaven’s Gate opens wide,*
*Six Jia* (六甲) *support me,*
*Golden lock, jade key—*
*Swiftly comply, do not delay.*
*Sweep away all impurities,*
*Malevolent spirits, beware.*
*Urgent, as the Celestial Command.*

*The Jade Maiden Riding Incantation*
*Heaven’s Gate, Heaven’s Gate,*
*Today is auspicious and good.*
*The Jade Maiden, the Jade Maiden,*
*Attend and guard beside me.*
*Departing in the Four Directions,*
*No calamity shall meet me.*
*The noble shall see me,*
*Joy and delight without end.*
*All requests fulfilled,*
*Ten thousand matters prosper.*
*Urgent, as the Supreme Unity’s Command.*

*According to the Day Branch* (子日) *example, follow this pattern.*

**Supreme Unity’s High Purity Eight Scenes Returning Chariot Complete Dao/Way of Flying Spirit Secret Method** (太上上清八景回车毕道飞灵秘法)
*On the very day of the Great Heat* (大暑),
*When the Earth Branch* (土旺) *is potent,*
*One may conceal their form, hide their traces,*
*So none shall see them,*
*And transform into another shape.*
*The Six Wu* (六戊) *follow the talisman,*
*Close the array with Wu Chen* (戊辰).
*The incantation—*
*The Heavenly Spirits aid the High Purity Dao/Way,*
*Seal its name.*
*One person may perform it,*
*And all Nine Heavens and Ten Thousand Earths shall obey.*

**Great Heat Six Wu Concealment Talisman** (大暑六戊隐形符)
*The Left True Person* (左真人) *says:*
*This Six Wu Method,*
*When deploying the array and acting,*
*Is equal in power to Heaven’s Gate and Earth’s Gate,*
*The Phoenix Star* (蓬星), *Supreme Yang* (太阳), *Supreme Yin* (太阴),
*Marching the Hexagrams* (步罡), *Treading the Stars* (蹑斗),
*According to the Ten Heavenly Stems* (十干) *of day and time,*
*Enter first, invoking the spirit below the heart,*
*To fulfill the plans of the ritual.*
*Identify the directions of Heaven’s Gate and Earth’s Gate,*
*Know where the Jade Maiden stands guard.*
*Then, with the left hand holding a blade,*
*At the Ghost Gate* (鬼门) *take soil to build the walls,*
*Next, take the Six Wu talisman,*
*In the four straight directions of the Six Wu array,*
*Mark them with soil,*
*Press the Six Wu Seal between them,*
*And from the central soil rise,*
*So none shall see you,*
*Much less the common folk.*

**Six Wu Divine Talisman** (六戊神符)
*This talisman governs the Six Passes,*
*Press the Six Wu,*
*On yellow silk or yellow paper,*
*With female yellow ochre* (雌黄) *write the Branch and Stem* (支干) *of Wu,*
*And Vermilion write the seals.*

chunks.original_text: 先於戊辰祭之，以至戊午遍祭之，通灵也。 常用就书黄纸，酒祭之。 若有古城，以州厅看方位，六戊方所。 月厌州厅内空地上方取土一斗二升，以财纸酒奠六神。 或开窍埋符，以土掩之，烧钱在上。 如其地厌秽不净，空分土烧，符纸於其上，甲子旬戊辰上起。 余仿此。 无印，上书日下符，墨书神名。 右件六戊印，於六戊日，依日支于向旺地，闭无朱书，方图二寸八分。 ．六甲日，伐檀木刻之，咒曰： 今日之用，伐木刻印，天印奉劫，摄煞尽诸恶邪。 天地日月能河天下像，藏迹隐我形。 如天都玉井律令。 凡六戊安营以刀画，从本旬戊上起左行，划一周匝四围地界了，於中央立禹步，而咒曰： 太山之阳，恒山之阴，盗贼不起，虎狼不侵。 天帝奉我，使我潜形，城郭坚固，如同金关。 千凶万恶，莫敢来干。 急急如律令。
chunks.translated_text:
First, on the **Wu-Chen** day, make the offering, and continue through to **Wu-Wu**, thus communicating with spirits.

Always use yellow paper to write the talisman, and offer it with wine.

If there is an ancient city, determine its cardinal directions by the prefectural and county offices, marking the **Six Wu** positions.

Within the prefectural and county offices, take soil from the empty ground above the **monthly taboo** area—one *dou* and two *sheng*—and with wealth paper and wine, make offerings to the Six Gods.

Alternatively, open the **orifice** and bury the talisman, covering it with soil, and burn paper money above it.

If the land is unclean or impure, divide the soil, burn it, and place the talisman and paper upon it, beginning on **Jia-Zi** of the **Wu-Chen** decan.

The rest follows similarly.

If there is no seal, write the talisman below the day’s name in ink, and inscribe the deity’s name.

**Right:** This **Six Wu Seal**, on **Six Wu** days, according to the day’s Branch, carve it on a thriving patch of land, without vermilion, in a square diagram of **2.8 cun**.

On **Six Jia** days, fell a **sandalwood** tree to carve it, and chant:

*"Today’s use, felling wood to carve the seal,
The Heavenly Seal is delivered to the **Effigy**,
Seizing the **killer star**, exhausting all evil spirits.
Heaven, Earth, Sun, and Moon—
Their power spreads beneath the heavens like an image,
Hiding my traces, concealing my form.
As the **Heavenly Capital’s Jade Well Decree** commands."*

For **Six Wu** encampments, draw with a blade, beginning from the **Wu** of the current decan and moving leftward, encircling the perimeter in one continuous stroke to mark the boundaries. At the center, perform the **Yu Step**, and chant:

*"On the sunny slope of **Tai Mountain**,
In the shadow of **Heng Mountain**,
Thieves and bandits shall not rise,
Tigers and wolves shall not intrude.
The Heavenly Emperor obeys me,
Hiding my form in concealment,
The city walls stand firm as iron,
Like the **Golden Pass** unbreached.
Ten thousand calamities, a hundred evils—
None dare approach.
Swiftly, as the **Decree** commands."*

chunks.original_text: 念咒了，地上向直旬戊方，取土一斗，均六堆，布六戊之方，念咒，逐堆以刀划下符，入土封穴，一斗二升土，均勿语。 如欲试之，取母牛一头，於中犊放门外，终不敢入。 谨请东方功曹、太冲、天罡大神，青帝、甲乙大将，谨请南方太一、胜光、小吉、赤帝、丙丁火神，谨请西方传送、从魁、河魁、白帝、庚辛大神，谨请北方登明、神后、大吉、黑帝、壬癸大神，降於局所侍卫我身。 请四方神讫便从今日日辰上一筹，行筹法，子戌、卯丑、寅巳、申亥、午辰、未酉，行六筹法讫。 先成天门，后成地户，四仲地户不成，取下筹第一支安辰克上，自然成局。 右喝行筹讫，次履北斗，摄伏众恶。 本经衍曰：天一之北神，若人逢恶存心存信罡步念此仪，则百恶莫敢害。 禹步讫，入局心，剑虚空，书大隐小隐符咒。 若记不得，刊二符，黄纸朱印，望空烧。 休门坎水地遁。 开门乾金天遁。 生门艮土雷遁。 伤门震木官遁。 杜门巽木伏遁。 景门离火正遁。 死门坤土景遁。 惊门兑金险遁。 本经曰：玉女返闭局室中六尺庭六步野六十步并以为数讫，便以左手执六筹，长一尺二寸，右手执刀，吸旺气，叩齿十二通，祷祝心下为某事。 然后，却回来背旺神，四旺神春卯、夏午、秋酉、冬子启请维某年某月某日某时，谨白天父地母，六甲六旬，十二时辰，青龙蓬星，明堂太阴，天门地户，玉女华盖，藏吾之身，隐吾之形，行不择日，出不择时。 今欲游行为某事，欲仗大神。 谨按天文，请玉女，画地数局，出天门，入地户，闭金关，乘玉女。 请玉女、青龙、白虎、朱雀、玄武、勾陈、胜蛇六合咒曰：六甲、六神、十二时辰，乘我而行到某处所之处，左右防护，随行而止，随作随起，辟除盗贼，鬼魅消亡。 君子见我，喜乐倍常； 小人见我，战战惶惶；
chunks.translated_text:
*«Once the incantation is complete, face the **straight decan Wu** direction on the ground, take one *dou* of soil, and evenly divide it into six piles. Arrange these piles in the **Wu** of the six decans, then recite the incantation and swiftly cut a talisman beneath each pile with a blade. Bury the soil and seal the hole—one *dou* and two *sheng* of earth, evenly measured, without speaking.

If one wishes to test it, take a heifer and place its calf outside the gate. The beast will never dare enter.

Now, solemnly invoke the **Eastern** gods: **Gongcao**, **Tai Chong**, and the **Heavenly Gang** Great Deity; **Qing Di**, the **Jia-Yi** generals. Invoke the **Southern** gods: **Tai Yi**, **Sheng Guang**, **Xiao Ji**, and **Chi Di**, the **Bing-Ding** Fire Deities. Invoke the **Western** gods: **Chuan Song**, **Cong Kui**, **He Kui**, and **Bai Di**, the **Geng-Xin** generals. Invoke the **Northern** gods: **Deng Ming**, **Shen Hou**, **Da Ji**, and **Hei Di**, the **Ren-Gui** generals, to descend and guard this site, protecting my person.

After invoking the four directions’ gods, begin from today’s **decan hour** and proceed with the **divinatory tally method**—in the sequence **Zi-Xu**, **Chou-Hai**, **Yin-Wei**, **Shen-Hai**, **Wu-Chen**, **Yin-Yu**—employing the **six-tally method** until completion.

First, establish the **Heavenly Gate (Tian Men)**, then the **Earthly Portal (Di Hu)**. If the four **central decans (Si Zhong)** fail to form the Earthly Portal, take the first tally of the **lower decan (Xia Shou)** and place it on the **upper decan (Gan Ke)**—the formation will naturally succeed.

Having completed the tally method with a shout, next traverse the **Northern Dipper (Bei Dou)**, subjugating all evils. The original scripture further states: The **God of the Northern Tian Yi**—if a person encounters malevolence with a sincere heart and faith, performs the **Yu Step**, and recites this ritual, then a hundred evils shall not dare harm.

After completing the **Yu Step**, enter the center of the formation. Draw the sword through empty space and inscribe the **Great Concealment (Da Yin)** and **Lesser Concealment (Xiao Yin)** talismans. If the words are forgotten, carve two talismans on yellow paper with vermilion seals and burn them toward the sky.

**Restriction Gate (Xiu Men)**—**Kan** Water, Earthly Escape (Di Dun).
**Opening Gate (Kai Men)**—**Qian** Gold, Heavenly Escape (Tian Dun).
**Life Gate (Sheng Men)**—**Gen** Soil, Thunder Escape (Lei Dun).
**Official Gate (Guan Men)**—**Zhen** Wood, Official Escape (Guan Dun).
**Stopping Gate (Du Men)**—**Xun** Wood, Subjugation Escape (Fu Dun).
**Joy Gate (Jing Men)**—**Li** Fire, Rectification Escape (Zheng Dun).
**Death Gate (Si Men)**—**Kun** Soil, Reflection Escape (Jing Dun).
**Risk Gate (Jing Men)**—**Dui** Gold, Hazard Escape (Xian Dun).

The original scripture states: Within a **six-foot courtyard** or **six-step wild formation**, or even **sixty steps**, these are the measures. Then, with the left hand holding the **six tallies**, each one a foot and two *cun* long, and the right hand holding the blade, inhale the **vigorous qi**, strike the teeth twelve times, and pray from the heart below, “For the sake of [certain matter].”

Then, return and face the **vigorous decan gods**, the four **vigorous decans**—**Spring Mao**, **Summer Wu**, **Autumn You**, **Winter Zi**—and solemnly invoke: “In the year [X], month [X], day [X], hour [X], I respectfully inform **Heavenly Father** and **Earthly Mother**, the **Six Jia** and **Six Decans**, the **Twelve Earthly Branches**, the **Qing Long** and **Peng Star**, the **Ming Tang** and **Tai Yin**, the **Heavenly Gate** and **Earthly Portal**, the **Jade Maiden** and **Hua Gai**, to conceal my body and hide my form. I depart without regard for auspicious days, and return without regard for auspicious times.

Now, to travel for [certain matter], relying on the Great Deities. I solemnly consult the **celestial omens**, invoke the **Jade Maiden**, draw the earthly measures, exit through the **Heavenly Gate**, enter the **Earthly Portal**, close the **Golden Pass**, and ride upon the **Jade Maiden**.

I invoke the **Jade Maiden**, **Qing Long**, **Bai Hu**, **Zhu Que**, **Xuan Wu**, **Gou Chen**, and **Sheng She**—the **Six Harmonious Talismans**—and recite the incantation:

“Six Jia, Six Gods, Twelve Earthly Branches,
Riding with me to reach [certain place].
Guard on my left and right,
Cease when I stop, rise when I act.
Ward off thieves and bandits,
Dispel ghosts and spirits.
The virtuous see me and rejoice beyond measure;
The petty see me and tremble in fear.”»

chunks.original_text: 男女见我，供列酒浆，谋我者死，当我者亡。 今日禹步，上应天罡，玉女侍傍，下辟不祥，万精厌伏，所向无殃。 所治者安，所攻者胜，所击者破，所求者得，所愿者成。 急急如律令。 常王大神、二千石、长吏见我者，爱如赤子，万姓见我者，尊如父母。 今日谨召玉女大神，随我者进引，邀我者还官，复去宝旗。 出召神启请讫，以禹步法。 三步九迹，丁字九步，一步七尺，三七二十一尺。 右以手执六算子，执剑自艮土，画地顺行，周讫，却插剑在艮土为鬼神，众恶自伏。 入局讫，次履北斗，召请九星步罡，口逐一念： 斗要妙兮，十二辰乘灵光兮。 威武陈炁仿兮，如浮云七变动兮，上应天知变化兮，有吉凶入斗宿兮。 过天关合六律兮，治甲兵履天英兮。 度天任清泠渊兮，可陆沉受天柱兮。 拥天心从此度兮，蹑天禽倚天辅兮。 望天冲入天内兮，出天蓬斗道通兮。 天柔险万恶珍兮，百鬼废添福禄兮。 留后世入杳冥兮，千万岁。 急急如律令。 甲丙戊庚壬阳日先立天英 天内，左足八，天柱，左足三，天心，两足旋左足践四。 天英，左足起一，天禽，左足五。 天蓬，右足天蓬出。 天辅，左足左跷六。 天冲，左足七。 天任，左足二。 乙丁己辛癸阴日先立天蓬 天内，右足二。 天柱，左足七。 天心，右足六。 天英，左足九。 天禽，左足五。 天蓬左足一。 天辅，左足四。 天冲，左足三，天任，右足八。 咒曰： 六律九章，天圆地方，四时五行，日月为光。 禹步治道，蚩尤辟兵。 青龙挟毂，白虎扶衰。 荧惑前引，辟除不祥，北斗诛恶，灭去凶殃。 五神侍卫，周游四方，左杜右稷，为吾铃缚。 千口万舌，恶人恶鬼，虎狼盗贼，缄闭伏秽。 急急如律令。 咒讫，左旋入地户，出天门，从玉女方而出。 咒曰： 玉女玉女，护我保我。 玉女玉女，卫我侍我，无令百鬼中伤，行到某处，人鬼莫能识我。 窈窈冥冥，莫视其形。 人见我者，以为非人，以为束薪。 人不闻其声，鬼不见其精。 善我者福，恶我者殃。 百邪鬼贼，当我者死，值我者亡。 千人以上，万人之中，见我者喜悦。 独开我门，而塞地户。 急急如律令。
chunks.translated_text:
Now, when men and women see me, they shall set forth wine and offerings.
Those who plot against me shall die, those who oppose me shall perish.

Today, I perform the **Yǔbù** [步], ascending to the **Heavenly Ganges** [罡].
The **Jade Maiden** attends at my side,
while below, I repel all inauspiciousness.
Ten thousand spirits submit in dread,
and all evils are crushed beneath my tread.

Where I heal, peace is restored;
where I attack, victory is won;
where I strike, defeat is assured;
where I seek, fulfillment is granted;
where I wish, success is achieved.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

Noble **Chángwáng** [常王], great officials, and magistrates who see me
shall love me as their own child,
and all the people shall honor me as their parents.

Today, I solemnly invoke the **Jade Maiden** and her Great Deity,
who shall guide me forward,
and those who summon me shall be restored to their ranks,
while the **Precious Banner** [宝旗] is dismissed.

Having summoned and petitioned the spirits, I proceed with the **Yǔbù** method.
Three steps, nine tracks,
a **Dingzi** [丁字] step of nine paces,
each pace seven *chǐ* [尺], three times seven—twenty-one *chǐ*.

With my right hand, I hold the **Six Calculus Talismans** [六算子],
grasp a sword from the **Gèn Soil** [艮土],
trace the earth in sequence,
and when complete, reverse and sheath the sword in **Gèn Soil** to command the ghosts and spirits—
all malevolence shall be subdued.

Having entered the formation, next I tread the **Big Dipper** [北斗],
summoning the **Nine Stars** [九星] and their **Gāng Steps** [步罡].
With each step, I recite aloud:

*"The Dipper’s splendor is wondrous,
Riding the twelve *shíchén* [时辰] upon its luminous light.
Its awe and might are manifest,
Like floating clouds shifting seven times—
ascending to the Heavenly Hosts who know all transformations,
entering the Dipper’s lodges with fortune or calamity.

Passing the Heavenly Gate, harmonizing the Six *Lǜ* [律],
commanding arms and treading the Heavenly Ganges [天英].
Crossing the Heavenly Task [天任] into the Clear and Cold Abyss [清泠渊],
one may sink or stand firm upon the Heavenly Pillar [天柱].

Embracing the Heavenly Heart [天心] from this crossing,
stepping upon the Heavenly Game [天禽] and leaning on the Heavenly Auxiliary [天辅].
Gazing toward the Heavenly Surge [天冲] into the Heavenly Interior [天内],
exiting through the Heavenly Cover [天蓬]—the Dipper’s path is clear.

The Heavenly Gentle [天柔] dispels ten thousand evils,
and all ghosts, abandoned, bring forth blessings and longevity.
Preserved for future generations, entering the dim and boundless [杳冥],
for ten thousand years.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

On **Yang days** [阳日] of the **Six Heavenly Stems** [甲丙戊庚壬]:
First, establish the **Heavenly Ganges** [天英] and **Heavenly Interior** [天内].
Left foot, eight paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱],
left foot, three paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱]—
**Heavenly Heart** [天心], both feet rotating, left foot steps four.

**Heavenly Ganges** [天英], left foot rises one pace;
**Heavenly Game** [天禽], left foot, five paces.

**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬], right foot steps—**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬] emerges.
**Heavenly Auxiliary** [天辅], left foot, six paces (left foot lifted).
**Heavenly Surge** [天冲], left foot, seven paces.
**Heavenly Task** [天任], left foot, two paces.

On **Yin days** [阴日] of the **Six Heavenly Stems** [乙丁己辛癸]:
First, establish **Heavenly Cover** [天蓬] and **Heavenly Interior** [天内].
Right foot, two paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱],
left foot, seven paces for **Heavenly Pillar** [天柱]—
**Heavenly Heart** [天心], right foot, six paces.

**Heavenly Ganges** [天英], left foot, nine paces;
**Heavenly Game** [天禽], left foot, five paces.
**Heavenly Cover** [天蓬], left foot, one pace.
**Heavenly Auxiliary** [天辅], left foot, four paces.
**Heavenly Surge** [天冲], left foot, three paces;
**Heavenly Task** [天任], right foot, eight paces.

The incantation reads:

*"Six *Lǜ* [律] and Nine *Cháng* [章],
Heaven’s round and Earth’s square,
Four seasons and Five *Xíng* [行],
Sun and Moon as radiance.

The **Yǔbù** [禹步] governs the Dao,
**Chīyóu** [蚩尤] repels the armies.
**Qīnglóng** [青龙] seizes the axle,
**Bái Hǔ** [白虎] supports the decline.
**Yínghuò** [荧惑] leads the way,
repelling all inauspiciousness,
while the **Big Dipper** [北斗] slays evil,
and extinguishes all calamitous omens.

The Five Spirits [五神] guard and attend me,
circling the four quarters.
**Dù** [杜] on my left, **Jì** [稷] on my right,
bind them as my bells and chains.

Thousand mouths, ten thousand tongues,
malevolent men and malevolent ghosts,
tigers, wolves, thieves, and bandits—
all sealed and subdued in filth.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.*

Having finished the incantation,
I turn left and enter the **Earthly Portal** [地户],
exit through the **Heavenly Gate** [天门],
and depart in the direction of the **Jade Maiden**.

The incantation reads:

*"Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,
protect me, preserve me.
Jade Maiden, Jade Maiden,
guard me, attend me—
let no hundred ghosts harm me.
Traveling to [certain place],
neither man nor ghost shall recognize me.

Mysterious and shadowy,
no one sees my form.
Men who see me take me for a bundle of firewood,
and hear no sound from me.
Ghosts see no trace of my **qi** [精].

Those who favor me shall prosper,
those who harm me shall suffer.
A hundred malevolent ghosts and bandits—
those who face me shall die,
those who encounter me shall perish.

Among a thousand people, ten thousand,
those who see me shall rejoice.
I open my own gate alone,
and block the Earthly Portal [地户].
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands."*
